subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With Mets pitchers batting .000 this season, and with the Yankees and the Mets set to play each other four times this week, now is probably as good a time as any to revisit the legend of Dae-Sung Koo.
snippet: With Mets pitchers batting .000 this season, and with the Yankees and the Mets set to play each other four times this week, now is probably as good a time as any to revisit the legend of Dae-Sung Koo.
